Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Ashland
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Ashland due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are standing near Ashland due to fire department activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Clark/Lake and Harlem terminal to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
